description: Noname, the Chicago rapper known for her collaborations with Chance the Rapper, is in The New York Times headquarters to perform some songs and answer questions from the online audience. Joe Coscarelli and Andrew Chow, who cover music for The Times, are in the room with her and will be addressing your questions and sharing their thoughts throughout. Join in the conversation here.
title: Live! With The Times: The Chicago Rapper Noname
title_page: Live! With The Times: The Chicago Rapper Noname - The New York Times
text:
Welcome Everyone! Excited for our live music with Noname. She is playing from the 15th floor of The New York Times headquarters in Manhattan. If you are an avid reader of our music stories, you’ll know about Noname from Joe Coscarelli’s recent story:
Joe is here joining the live performance and he will take your questions here in the comments as we watch Noname play. Ask away and share this with your friends! Music starts at 2:30pm.
